content: **low vision accessible pattern available** **accessibility statement ** this pattern has a print disability and screen reader friendly version that version has 23pt arial font no italics are used with written instructions the pattern contains images all of which have alt text and captions abbreviations and symbols have been removed from the pattern the pattern has been reviewed using the word read aloud function in adobe acrobat **introduction** the seed scrubber is a perfect addition to any household and makes a thoughtful gift this knit pattern can also be used to create items for sale just make sure to give me credit for the pattern the seed scrubber is worked flat and comes in four different sizes so you can make one that s just the right fit for your hands every scrubby collection needs a rectangular scrubby and this one is both practical and fun to make **skills** this project is suited for knitters who are comfortable to work in or who are open to learning the following skills and techniques cast-on knit purl bind-off not familiar with these techniques no problem the pattern includes links to helpful tutorial videos to guide you every step of the way **materials** *yarn recommendations* herrschners suds & scrub yarn fiber content polyester 100% 2 8 oz/80 g 101 yards/93 meters or any yarn that knits to gauge sample used 2/7 ⅓ ⅖ ½ oz/8 9 11 14 g 10 12 14 18 yards/10 11 13 17 meters one ball in color no 0002 emerald colorway *knitting needles* us size 8/5 mm or size used to match gauge-straight or circular as you prefer *notions* scissors stitch marker for rs of fabric tapestry needle **gauge** 17 sts x 27 row over 4 /10 cm in seed stitch worked flat 15 sts x 22 row over 4 /10 cm in stockinette stitch worked flat **size information** xs s m l *finished measurements* 2 5x3 5 3x4 25 3 5x4 5 4x5 inches or 6 5x9 7 5x10 5 9x11 10x12 5 cm 1 https //www ozzylosiknitdesigns com/seedscrubber/ 2 https //www ozzylosiknitdesigns com/summer-of-scrubbies-2025/
